trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides an abstraction of a property on a class.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the component this property is bound to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the type converter for this property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether this property is read-only.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the property is read-only; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether value change notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if value change notifications may originate from outside the property descriptor; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enables other objects to be notified when this property changes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component to add the handler for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The delegate to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: component or handler is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, returns whether resetting an object changes its value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component to test for reset capability.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if resetting the component changes its value; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an instance of the specified type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A new instance of the type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Compares this to another object to see if they are equivalent.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the values are equivalent; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A collection of property descriptor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A component to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A component to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets an editor of the specified type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The base type of editor, which is used to differentiate between multiple editors that a property supports.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx$ xxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An instance of the requested editor type, or null if an editor cannot be found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the hash code for this object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The hash code for this object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This method returns the object that should be used during invocation of members.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The potential invocation target.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a type using its name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The assembly-qualified name of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx$xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets the current value of the property on a component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property for which to retrieve the value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of a property for a given component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves the current set of ValueChanged event handlers for a specific component

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xx $xxxx$XxxxxXxxxxxx$$xxxx$ xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component for which to retrieve event handlers.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A combined multicast event handler, or null if no event handlers are currently assigned to component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Raises the ValueChanged event that you implemented.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx $xxxx$XxxxxXxxxxxx$$xxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enables other objects to be notified when this property changes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component to remove the handler for.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The delegate to remove as a listener.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: component or handler is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, resets the value for this property of the component to the default value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property value that is to be reset to the default value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, sets the value of the component to a different value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property value that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xx xx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The new value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, determines a value indicating whether the value of this property needs to be persisted.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property to be examined for persistence.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the property should be persisted; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
